intro.title: COMPUTER TYCOON
intro.description: The year is 1983. You stand at the dawn of a revolution. Computers are no longer just room-filling machines for scientists and corporations. They're becoming part of everyday life - for gamers, home users, and businesses.
intro.question: Will you become the next Steve Jobs or Jack Tramiel?
intro.prompt: > SYSTEM READY. PRESS START TO BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY...

context.title: Historical Context
context.description: The home computer era (1983-1992) was a time of tremendous innovation. You witnessed the evolution from 8-bit systems with just KB of RAM to powerful 32-bit computers with MB of memory. From 1993 onwards, IBM-compatible PCs and gaming consoles like SNES dominated the market. The era of experimental home computers is over - but your company made history!
